title: Salicylic acid
summary: Salicylic acid is an organic compound with the formula HOC6H4CO2H.  A colorless, bitter-tasting solid, it is a precursor to and a metabolite of aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid). It is a plant hormone.[9] The name is from Latin salix for willow tree. It is an  ingredient in some anti-acne products. Salts and esters of salicylic acid are known as salicylates.
